short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for assistance with document packs in BIS Platform

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to automatically fill life assurance application forms for your clients with data from the BIS system. It can pull data from the client record or from document pack forms that you have previously sent to your client and they have populated.
